titleStmt.title: An humble remonstrance to the right honourable, the Lords in the High Court of Parliament

publicationStmt.publisher: Piinted [sic] and are to be sold by S. B.,

notesStmt.note: A reply to the petition of Sir Thomas Aston.
With royal coat of arms on title page.

Imperfect as filmed. "To the truly religious reader" is filmed as part of Thomason E.178[4], but is actually the epistle dedicatory to "Supersitio superstes", with imprint: "London: printed for P. W.. 1641.", Thomason E.178[5].
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
